name: react_typescript_staging_demo
description: ## usage   ### load dependencies     npm install or yarn  ### start     npm run start or yarn start  ### build     npm run build or yarn build  ## project tree     ├─.babelrc ---------> babel config     ├─.eslintrc.js -----> runtime eslint config     ├─index.html -------> app container     ├─index.tsx --------> app entry     ├─package.json -----> project config     ├─README.MD --------> project description     ├─tsconfig.json ----> tsconfig     ├─webpack.config.js-> basic config     ├─webpack.dev.js ---> development     ├─webpack.prod.js --> production     ├─src     |  ├─app.tsx -------> component entry     |  ├─global.css  ---> global css     |  ├─global.less ---> global less     |  ├─utils ---------> utils     |  |   └global.ts     |  ├─services ------> request     |  |    └request.ts     |  ├─pages ---------> display page     |  |   ├─home     |  |   |  ├─index.tsx     |  |   |  └other.tsx     |  ├─models --------> global data manage     |  |   ├─index.ts     |  |   └store.tsx     |  ├─assets --------> resource     |  |   └image.png
author: he-web369
